item.title: Part 9: Serverless functions: Who responded?
item.description: In our previous blog posts in the Kong Gateway series, we explored various security aspects, particularly focusing on token-related issues and their solutions involving both Kong and custom-built plugins. Today, we dive deeper into another coding variant within the gateway: Kong serverless functions. We will use a real-world “Who Responded?” example to demonstrate how effectively a root cause analysis approach can be supported with minimal effort.
